topic.title: Now Available: Foreign Relations of the United States, 1977–1980, Volume XVII, Part 1, Horn of Africa
topic.body: The focus of the volume is on the Carter administration’s approach to events in the Horn of Africa and includes relations with Ethiopia, Somalia, and Djibouti (before and after its independence).
topic.image-description: Book cover of Foreign Relations of the United States, 1977–1980, Volume XVII, Part 1, Horn of Africa
topic.image-source-information: Created by the Office of the Historian
